image_analysis.ai_description: Two bright pink KAKSS dumbbells rest on a white surface. They feature a smooth neoprene coating for grip. The ends are hexagonal to stop rolling and clearly display '1 KG' and the brand name in white text. Perfect for adding resistance to home workouts.

comparison_points.competitor_issue: Slippery plastic or bare metal surface
